What are the treatments for 1p36 deletion syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of 1p36 deletion syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: 1p36 Deletion Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Chromosome 1p36 deletion syndrome   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genet
